dialogue.text: Mum... singing with you... it felt so real. Like you were right here.
It *was* real, for this moment. But the brightest stars eventually return to the cosmos, my love.
No! Please! Don't leave me again... It hurts too much!
Oh, my sweet Jasmine... I am always with you. Look up. That's where I'll be.
You carry my light now. *You* are the rising star. Your father... he needs your light too. Don't let him lose himself in the dark.
I love you, Mum. So much.
I love you infinitely, my PJ. More than every star in the sky. Now go. *Illuminate* everything.
My only regret is that I won't be with you to see it all...
Mum! NO! WAIT! COME BACK! Please... don't go...
